alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 6:28AM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with isolated higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Northern Erie, Crawford and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may drop between one half and one mile at times in heavier bands of snow later this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
